channel.title: Hiring new coders for MetaCore
channel.description:
We're hiring new coders for MetaCore. MetaCore is a team that codes sources and clients such as:
o FunScape o Project16 o Silabsoft o MoparScape o And loads more..
If you're good enough, or at least you think you are, please fill out this form in a reply or pm: ------------------------------------------- Name: Put Yes or No to the skills you're able to do: HTML: VB: Other: If other please type here: ------------------------------------------
:)
